text: is a Japanese football player. He played for the Japan national team. ==Biography== Osako was born in Izumi on July 28, 1999. He joined J1 League club Sanfrecce Hiroshima from their youth team in 2018. He played many matches from 2019. In May 2019, Osako was selected the Japan national team for 2019 Copa Am√©rica.
